fullText: This handsome, well-cast revival of Cole Porter's 1948 musical comedy proves that Kiss Me, Kate still has plenty of bite. Kelli O'Hara and Will Chase make a formidable pair as the divorced actors whose onstage chemistry in The Taming of the Shrew mirrors their offstage tensions.
